content: the **easiest crochet granny stitch scarf** is a beginner-friendly timeless accessory worked with the classic granny stitch this scarf features straight edges matching ends and only two yarn tails giving it a polished professional finish without the stress of complicated instructions written in plain english no abbreviations the pattern also includes step-by-step video tutorials for both left- and right-handed crocheters with a simple one-row repeat this project is quick relaxing and endlessly versatile perfect for gifting stash-busting or making a stylish handmade scarf for yourself ✔️ beginner-friendly one-row repeat ✔️ written in plain english no abbreviations ✔️ includes left & right-handed video tutorials ✔️ straight edges and matching ends ✔️ adaptable to any yarn weight ✅ free pattern https //bit ly/3vn8hqm ✅ printable pdf pattern https //bit ly/4py3c60 ✅ right handed tutorial https //youtu be/v_bsxf0rxfa ✅ left handed tutorial https //youtu be/mhh6onf62va
